post.desc:
While this is the usual immortal love case, I think there's another spin we can take. "Izayoi Sakuya" is not Sakuya's original name. Perhaps when she was taken in, she didn't have one â€“ so Remilia gave her the name of a previous human who was also precious to her in the past.

Or perhaps she has done that many times, and our Sakuya here is the **16th** companion. ðŸŒ–
